const App = () => { const movie1 = { Title: "The Lion King", Cast: [ "Donald Glover", "Seth Rogen", "Chiwetel Ejiofor", "Alfre Woodard", "Billy Eichner", "John Kani", "John Oliver", "Beyoncé Knowles-Carter", "James Earl Jones", ], Director: "Jon Favreau", Producer: "Jon Favreau, Jeffrey Silver, Karen Gilchrist", Ratings: "6.8", Year: "2019", Runtime: "118 min", Poster: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwMjE1Nzc4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg4OTA1NzM@._V1_SX300.jpg", }; const castString = Cast.join(" "); return (

Title: {movie1.Title}

Cast: {movie1.Cast}

Director: {movie1.Director}

Producer: {movie1.Producer}

Ratings: {movie1.Ratings}

Year: {movie1.Year}

Runtime: {movie1.Runtime}

); }; export default App;
